Title: Establishes the Adirondack Park forest preserve study commission to examine land-management practices for certain classifications of state forest preserve lands
Summary: Establishes the Adirondack Park forest preserve study commission to examine land-management practices for certain classifications of state forest preserve lands.
ActClause: AN ACT establishing the Adirondack Park forest preserve study commission to examine land-management practices for certain classifications of state forest preserve lands; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
